projects.title: Photospheres
projects.description: A collaboration with Fred Choi, photospheres is a 2D interface for searching a set of photos without text. I implemented two different clustering algorithms (Image Hash based and VGG16 Neural Network based).

projects.title: C.S.S.A.W.
projects.description: Citizen Science for South African Waters, a project to improve water quantity monitoring in the Limpopo Basin. I spent 1 year on this project, taking it from inception to managing a team of 8 undergrads as we work to deploy our solution in South Africa.

projects.title: Dobot Scribe
projects.description: A project to make a 3 dof dobot draw letters using computer vision
